description:
My lovely aparment is close to the Central Park, Bloomingdales, Midtown, Upper East Side, Subway (Lexington Av/59 st. & 59 St: N, R, Q, 4, 5 & 6). 

What I like about the neighborhood is the many parks, green areas, art, cultur, stunning views, restaurants and fastfood places.
My apartment is great for couples, business trips and adventurers.
name: Spacious Studio close to Central Park and shopping
review: Great space to stay in New York. It is very clean and near Central Park
